excerpt: "Integrating AI into cybersecurity can turn it into a formidable defense tool. The rapid data processing capabilities and knack for spotting critical signs can allow AI to thoroughly examine vast datasets, revealing any hints of suspicious activities, unauthorized access or looming security risks."
